name: Chaos Run (sadjaÿ, Lafont)
description:
Chaos Run is a coop game with vehicle where your friend and you have to escape from a military base by stealing precious parcel with your forklift ! 

I hope you have a good dexterity and the patience to complete the game because that's not going to be easy ! 

The team : 

Hugo Lafont : 3D, Level Design & Environment Art (https://lafont.itch.io/)

And I : Programming, Integration & Sound Design & Level Design

Note: it's a coop. game so 2 persons are required !
